Row.Text: +15% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Amphitheater.

The Museum is a mid-game Building which increases the City's [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by 15%. The City must possess an Amphitheater (or a unique Building which replaces the Amphitheater) in order to construct the Museum. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Art.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Museum is a mid-game Building which increases the City's [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by 15%. The City must possess an Amphitheater (or a unique Building which replaces the Amphitheater) in order to construct the Museum. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Art.
